abstract thx.Disjunction<A, B>(Either<A, B>) from Either<A, B> to Either<A, B>

Available on all platforms

This abstract provides a right-biased functor and monad over the Either type.

Class Fields

function pure<E, A>(a:A):Disjunction<E, A>

Instance Fields

function flatMap<C>(f:B -> Either<A, C>):Disjunction<A, C>

function leftMap<C>(f:A -> C):Disjunction<C, B>

inline function map<C>(f:B -> C):Disjunction<A, C>
